Welcome to the orientation learning module for PSYC 2040! We will cover everything here and more on the first day of class. See you there.

## Goals

- Quick course orientation
- Show you how learning modules will work
- Get you ready for the first week

## Instructions 

Work through each of the following Read, View/Watch/listen, and Engage sections. You have the full week to complete any quizzes or assignments for this module.
